page.title: 20CHELMSFORD,THE FUTURE.
page.content: Chelmsford is progressing confidently towards the 21st. century.Employment in the area has not been affected by the economic recession as badly as other areas of the country.The continued expansion of housing and industry (including the Hi-Tech Park) gives cause for optimism,as does the fact that many local firms will be in growth sectors of the economy in the coming decades. {* * * * * * * * * * * * } The local information on these pages was researched and written by:- Mr.K.Grant and pupils of The Cathedral Primary School; Mr.S.Newman and pupils of Trinity Road County Primary School; Mr.B.Davis and pupils of Moulsham County Junior School. {* * * * * * * * * * * *
